channel.title: Error From Server Organization - runserver.bat
channel.description:
I need to know how to get rid of this error, I need replies:
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at NpcAnimHandler.loadanim(NpcAnimHandler.java:24) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:21) at server.main(server.java:30) Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Even though I'm making my new server at another place, I'm still trying to get this to work.

item.title: Error From Server Organization - runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

I need to know how to get rid of this error, I need replies:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at NpcAnimHandler.loadanim(NpcAnimHandler.java:24) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:21) at server.main(server.java:30) Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? Press any key to continue . . .

Even though I’m making my new server at another place, I’m still trying to get this to work.

Read full topic
